TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Tracking
TalentsTiers.Description: While tracking Beasts, Demons, Dragonkin, Elementals, Giants, Humanoids and Undead, all damage done to those types by the Hunter is increased by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Hawk Eye
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your ranged weapons by [@value] yards.

TalentsTiers.Name: Savage Strikes
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite and Counterattack by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Surefooted
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Entrapment
TalentsTiers.Description: When your Frost Trap or Snake Trap is triggered you entrap all affected targets, preventing them from moving for [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Trap Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description:
Frost Trap and Freezing Trap- Increases the duration by [@value]%.

Immolation Trap, Explosive Trap and Black Arrow - Increase the periodic damage done by [@value2]%.

Snake Trap - Increases the number of snakes summoned by [@value3].

TalentsTiers.Name: Survival Instincts
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces all damage taken by [@value]% and increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, and Explosive Shot by [@value2]%

TalentsTiers.Name: Survivalist
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Stamina by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Scatter Shot
TalentsTiers.Description:
8% of base mana
15 yd range

Instant Cast
30 sec cooldown

A short-range shot that deals 50% weapon damage and disorients the target for 4 sec. Any damage caused will remove the effect. Turns off your attack when used.

TalentsTiers.Name: Deflection
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to parry by [@value2]%, and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by [@value]%. This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Survival Tactics
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the chance your Feign Death ability and all trap spells will be resisted by [@value]%, and reduces the cooldown of your Disengage ability by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: T.N.T.
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Explosive Shot, Explosive Trap, Black Arrow and Immolation Trap by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Lock and Load
TalentsTiers.Description: You have a [@value]% chance when you trap a target with Freezing Trap, Freezing Arrow or Frost Trap and a [@value3]% chance when you deal periodic damage with your Immolation Trap , Explosive Trap or Black Arrow to cause your next [@value4] Arcane Shot or Explosive Shot spells to trigger no cooldown, cost no mana and consume no ammo. This effect has a [@value2] sec cooldown.

TalentsTiers.Name: Hunter vs. Wild
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases you and your pet's attack power and ranged attack power equal to [@value]% of your total Stamina.

TalentsTiers.Name: Killer Instinct
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your critical strike chance with all attacks by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Counterattack
TalentsTiers.Description:
2% of base mana
Melee range

Instant Cast
5 sec cooldown

A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack. This attack deals 40 damage and immobilizes the target for 5 sec. Counterattack cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

TalentsTiers.Name: Lightning Reflexes
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Agility by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Resourcefulness
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of all traps Hunter melee abilities and Black Arrow by [@value]% and reduces the cooldown of all traps and Black Arrow by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Expose Weakness
TalentsTiers.Description: Your ranged criticals have a [@value]% chance to apply an Expose Weakness effect to the target. Expose Weakness increases your attack power by [@value2]% of your Agility for [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Wyvern Sting
TalentsTiers.Description:
6% of base mana
5-25 yd range

Instant Cast
1 min cooldown

A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for 30 sec. Any damage will cancel the effect. When the target wakes up, the Sting causes 2460 Nature damage over 6 sec. Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Thrill of the Hunt
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to regain [@value2]% of the mana cost of any shot when it critically hits.

TalentsTiers.Name: Master Tactician
TalentsTiers.Description: Your successful ranged attacks have a [@value]% chance to increase your critical strike chance with all ranged and melee attacks by [@value2]% for [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Noxious stings
TalentsTiers.Description: If Wyvern Sting is dispelled, the dispeller is also afflicted by Wyvern Sting lasting [@value]% of the duration remaining, and increases all damage done by you on targets afflicted by your Serpent Sting by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Point of No Escape
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of all of your ranged and melee attacks on targets affected by your Frost Trap, Freezing Trap and Freezing Arrow by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Black Arrow
TalentsTiers.Description:
5% of base mana
5-35 yd range

Instant Cast
30 sec cooldown

Fires a Black Arrow at the target increasing all damage done by you to the target by 6% and dealing 786 Shadow damage over 15 seconds. Black Arrow shares a cooldown with Trap spells.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Sniper Training
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Kill Shot abiity by [@value]% an while standing still for [@value2] sec. you gain Sniper Training increasing the damage done by your Steady Shot, Aimed Shot, Black Arrow and Explosive Shots by [@value3]% for [@value4] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Hunting Party
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Agility by an additional [@value]% and your Arcane Shot, Explosive Shot and Steady Shot critical strikes have a [@value2]% chance to grant up to [@value3] party or raid members mana regeneration equal to [@value4]% of their maximum mana per [@value5] seconds. Lasts for [@value6] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Explosive Shot
TalentsTiers.Description:
6% of base mana
5-35 yd range

Instant Cast
6 sec cooldown

You fire an explosive charge into the enemy target, dealing 121-139 Fire damage. The charge will blast the target every second for an additional 2 sec.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks
